cause.description:
Harmony is a nonprofit, all-inclusive chorus committed to using the power of music to educate and empower its members and the community at large.
From its base in the gay and lesbian community, Harmony's music celebrates difference, effects positive change, and works toward achieving equality for all people.
1. Celebrates difference
2. Effects positive change
3. Works toward achieving equality for all people
cause.mission: The power and joy of GLBTS voices
